processVariables.name: 2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date
processVariables.displayName: 2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date

children.name: Introduction

blocks.text: When aiming to transform and improve your processes, it can help you to understand exactly what transaction codes you’re currently using for certain processes and process steps. This can be important as part of an SAP S/4HANA transformation, for example. You might also want to know to what extent you’re using standard transactions and for which process steps you’re using custom transactions. This information is useful if you intend to reduce the use of custom transactions in SAP S/4HANA. It’s especially important if you aim to start your transformation journey towards SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition, where such custom transactions aren’t supported.

Analyzing the transactions that you're using in your processes can help you identify harmonization potential – both within and across entities. If a range of different transactions are being used for the same process step, this indicates a need to further streamline your way of working.

You can also use the following analyses to assess whether you're using the recommended and standard SAP transactions intended to be used for the process steps. In combination with other information, this can help you to identify root causes of low Best-Run Scores.

The following analysis provides an overview of the transaction codes that are used for this process flow variant, including custom transaction usage. It allows you to understand to what extent the use of transaction codes is harmonized for process steps and to drill down into further details.

children.name: 01. Overview
How to use

blocks.text: The following section provides a first overview of how many transaction codes are used on average for each process step. Harmonizing the use of transaction codes for a specific process step can make processes more efficient, reduce onboarding and training efforts, and simplify reporting. You also see what proportion of the transactions used in the process relates to custom transactions. If a significant number of activities are completed using custom transactions, you might want to check whether standard transaction codes can be used instead. Using standard transaction codes empowers you to lower total cost of ownership and prepare for your SAP S/4HANA transformation.

children.name: Transaction code usage per process step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
    "Process step",
    "KPI name",
    "# Cases"
FROM
(
SELECT 
    "Process step",
    'AVG number of TCODEs per step' AS "KPI name",
     AVG("Transaction code") AS "# Cases",
     "New Order"
FROM
(
SELECT
	'Delivery item creation' AS "Process step",
	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)") AS "Transaction code",
    1 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order header' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)") AS "Transaction code",
    2 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order schedule line' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)") AS "Transaction code",
    3 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp

UNION ALL
--Custom
SELECT 
    "Process step",
    'AVG number of custom TCODEs used' AS "KPI name",
    AVG("Custom transaction code") AS "# Cases",
    "New Order"
FROM
(
SELECT
	'Delivery item creation' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
      OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
      OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
    1 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order header' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
      OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
      OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
    2 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order schedule line' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
      OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
      OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
    3 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp
ORDER BY 4 ASC
) AS temp2

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction usage
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, which are executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT  
    100 - COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    /
    COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Rate"

from THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG number of transaction codes used per step
children.description: AVG number of transaction codes used per step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
AVG("Transaction code") AS "AVG number of TCODEs per step"
FROM
(
SELECT
	'Delivery item creation' AS "Process step",
	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)") AS "Transaction code",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order header' AS "Process step",
	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)") AS "Transaction code",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Release delivery block in sales order schedule line' AS "Process step",
	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)") AS "Transaction code",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp

children.name: Total number of cases
Total number of cases using custom transaction codes
children.description: Total number of cases using custom transaction codes

dataSource.query:
SELECT  
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		"6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)"  LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)"  LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)"  LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id  ELSE NULL END )
	+
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		"6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id ELSE null END )
	+
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		"6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)"   LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id ELSE null END )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time using custom transaction codes
children.description: AVG cycle time using at least one custom transaction code in the process

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time))) 
	FILTER 
	(WHERE CASE WHEN 
	    "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
		OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
	    THEN case_id ELSE null END IS NOT NULL)
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Further analysis

blocks.text: The following sections provide more details on the transaction codes used across organizational units. This analysis helps you to understand in which organizational units work is most or least harmonized. You can identify organizational units in which use of custom transactions is more widespread for a certain process step. These insights are useful in highlighting your organization’s best and worst practices. This information can serve as a basis for defining your target processes. Comparing the use of transaction codes across organizational units running a similar business can also serve as a starting point for discussing root causes and potentially agreeing on a common target process. If you want to avoid using certain transaction codes in the future, this analysis can help you to identify where use of these transaction codes is currently most widespread. This allows you to address pending changes in how these units work in a systematic way. Avoiding the use of custom transaction codes is a key aspect to consider, for example, where they’re no longer supported with SAP S/4HANA and have been replaced by alternative options.
Note: When transaction codes are shown as "null", this can indicate that the program was triggered by background processing.

children.name: 02. Delivery item creation
Delivery item creation

blocks.text: The outbound delivery is a document representing the goods to be delivered together to a goods recipient. It is used as the basis for the delivery note or for sending a shipping notification. It can be created manually via transactions VL01/VL01N, ideally, it is created automatically, which would mean that the Transaction Code is shown as blank.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for delivery item creation by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT "# Cases", 
		"Transaction code", 
        "Sales organization"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "Sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# Cases", 
         "Transaction code", 
         "Sales organization",
         "Sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases", 
         "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" AS "Transaction code", 
         "1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" as "Sales organization",
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" ) as "Sum"
         FROM
       THIS_PROCESS WHERE "6 - Other - Created on (I) (ERDAT_I)" IS NOT NULL) AS SUB
    ) AS Sub
WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction codes used for delivery item creation
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, for which this process step has been executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	100 - COUNT( 
    	CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
		  OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
		  THEN case_id 
        ELSE null END ) 
    / COUNT(case_id) 
		* 100 as "Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Created on (I) (ERDAT_I)" IS NOT NULL

	"6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
	OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
	OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
	THEN case_id ELSE null END ) AS "# Custom transaction codes"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-

	    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Delivery item creation

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Supplier invoices created after posting date

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices previously parked) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases",
	AVG(
			(SELECT LAST(end_time))
			-
			(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
		AS "AVG cycle time",
    AVG("2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date" )*100 AS "Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)",
	COUNT(DISTINCT "6 - Other - Created By (ERNAM_DEL)") AS "# Users"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Created on (I) (ERDAT_I)" IS NOT NULL

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for delivery item creation by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT  "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"# Cases",
        "Sales organization"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    				"6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Z%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE 'Y%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Transaction Code (TCODE_DEL)" LIKE '/%'
    				THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    			    /
    				COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" AS "Sales organization"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: 03. Release delivery block in sales order header
Release delivery block in sales order header

blocks.text: Deliveries can be blocked for various reasons - either per default, based on defined thresholds, or manually. As soon as the reasons for the blocking are resolved, the delivery is released. Making sure the delivery block is removed when the blocking reason is resolved is crucial to avoid late deliveries.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for release delivery block in sales order header by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 	"# Cases", 
		"Transaction code", 
    	"Sales organization"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "Sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# Cases", 
         "Transaction code", 
         "Sales organization",
         "Sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases", 
         "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" AS "Transaction code", 
         "1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" as "Sales organization",
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" ) as "Sum"
         FROM
         THIS_PROCESS 
	WHERE "6 - Other - Header prev. blocked (HDR_PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'B' 
	OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'C') AS SUB
    ) AS Sub
    WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction codes used for release delivery block in sales order header
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, for which this process step has been executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	100 - COUNT( 
    	CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
		  OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
		  THEN case_id 
        ELSE null END ) 
    / COUNT(case_id) 
		* 100 as "Rate"
        FROM THIS_PROCESS
        WHERE "6 - Other - Header prev. blocked (HDR_PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    	OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'B' 
		OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'C'

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Release delivery block in sales order header

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Supplier invoices created after posting date

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices previously parked) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases",
	AVG(
			(SELECT LAST(end_time))
			-
			(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
		AS "AVG cycle time",
        AVG("2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date" )*100 AS "Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)",
		AVG("2 - Blocker - Undelivered items with header incomplete")*100 AS "Undelivered items with header incomplete (%)", 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "6 - Other - Header block rel. by (LIFSK_REL_USER)" ) AS "# Users"
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
    WHERE "6 - Other - Header prev. blocked (HDR_PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'B' 
	OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (H) (LSSTK)"  LIKE 'C'

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for release delivery block in sales order header by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT  "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"# Cases",
        "Sales organization"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    				"6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Hdr. block rel. with (LIFSK_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    				THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    			    /
    				COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" AS "Sales organization"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: 04. Release delivery block in sales order schedule line
Release delivery block in sales order schedule line

blocks.text: Deliveries items can be blocked for various reasons - either per default, based on defined thresholds, or manually. As soon as the reasons for the blocking are resolved, the delivery item is released. Making sure the delivery block is removed when the blocking reason is resolved is crucial to avoid late deliveries.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for release delivery block in sales order schedule line by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT "# Cases", 
		"Transaction code", 
    	"Sales organization"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "Sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# Cases", 
         "Transaction code", 
         "Sales organization",
         "Sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases", 
         "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" AS "Transaction code", 
         "1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" as "Sales organization",
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)") as "Sum"
         FROM
         THIS_PROCESS
			 WHERE "6 - Other - Item previ. blocked (ITM_PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL	
        	OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (I) (LSSTA)" LIKE 'B'	
			OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (I) (LSSTA)" LIKE 'C'
			) AS SUB
    		) AS Sub
WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Release delivery block in sales order schedule line

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Supplier invoices created after posting date

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices previously parked) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id" ) AS "# Cases",
	AVG(
			(SELECT LAST(end_time))
			-
			(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
		AS "AVG cycle time",
        AVG("2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date")*100 AS "Delivery created after planned material availability date (%)",
		AVG("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete for delivery")*100 AS "Sales order items incomplete for delivery (%)",
	COUNT(DISTINCT "6 - Other - Item block rel. by (LIFSP_REL_USER)") AS "# Users"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
 WHERE "6 - Other - Item previ. blocked (ITM_PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL	
        OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (I) (LSSTA)" LIKE 'B'	
		OR "6 - Other - Ovrl Del Blk Sts (I) (LSSTA)" LIKE 'C'

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for release delivery block in sales order schedule line by sales organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT  "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"# Cases",
        "Sales organization"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    				"6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Item block rel. with (LIFSP_REL_TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    				THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    			    /
    				COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Sales Org. (VKORG)" AS "Sales organization"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Details
Case table

parameter.name: 2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability date
